Package org.apache.juneau

Class InvalidDataConversionException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
org.apache.juneau.BasicRuntimeException
org.apache.juneau.InvalidDataConversionException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InvalidDataConversionException extends BasicRuntimeException
General invalid conversion exception.

Exception that gets thrown if you try to perform an invalid conversion, such as when calling JsonMap.getInt(...) on a non-numeric String.
